object.name: deleteBusinessMessages
object.description: Delete messages on behalf of a business account. Requires the can_delete_outgoing_messages business bot right to delete messages sent by the bot itself, or the can_delete_all_messages business bot right to delete any message. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Delete messages on behalf of a business account. Requires the can_delete_outgoing_messages business bot right to delete messages sent by the bot itself, or the can_delete_all_messages business bot right to delete any message. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Delete messages on behalf of a business account. Requires the *can_delete_outgoing_messages* business bot right to delete messages sent by the bot itself, or the *can_delete_all_messages* business bot right to delete any message. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the business connection on behalf of which to delete the messages
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the business connection on behalf of which to delete the messages
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the business connection on behalf of which to delete the messages
annotations.name: business_connection_id

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized list of 1-100 identifiers of messages to delete. All messages must be from the same chat. See deleteMessage for limitations on which messages can be deleted
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized list of 1-100 identifiers of messages to delete. All messages must be from the same chat. See deleteMessage for limitations on which messages can be deleted
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized list of 1-100 identifiers of messages to delete. All messages must be from the same chat. See :class:`aiogram.methods.delete_message.DeleteMessage` for limitations on which messages can be deleted
annotations.name: message_ids
